Package controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BallController
    BallController is an Abstract Class that handles all the implementations regarding the Ball Movement.
    BrickController
    BrickController is an Abstract Class that handles all the implementations regarding the Bricks in the game.
    CrackController
    Crack class is a Nested Class under the BrickController abstract class as it is a feature of the Brick class.
    DebugPanelController
    DebugPanelController Class handles the implementation of the Debug Panel Window.
    GameFrameController
    GameFrameController is the class responsible for the implementation of the Game Frame window.
    GameTimeController
    GameTimeController class is responsible for handling and keeping track of the in-game time.
    PlayerController
    PlayerController class is an abstract class added in for extendability.
    ScoreController
    ScoreController class handles the scores implementation.
    WallController
    WallController class is responsible for all the implementations on the wall,ball and the impacts.
    WallControllerTest
